Getting Started Authentication API Reference

API Reference

This is the complete API reference for the ReadMe platform. Here you will find detailed information about all available endpoints and their parameters.

Authentication

All API requests require a valid API key. Include it in the header:

curl -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" https://api.example.com
